# Interface RetrieveKnowledgeInterface

Interface for knowledge retrieval parameters.

interface RetrieveKnowledgeInterface {  
collections: [KnowledgeCollection](/classes/primitives_knowledge_knowledge_collection.KnowledgeCollection)[];  
config?: [RetrievalConfigInterface](./common_types.RetrievalConfigInterface);  
history: [History](/classes/core_history.History);  
}

##### Index

### Properties

collections config? history

## Properties

### collections

collections: [KnowledgeCollection](/classes/primitives_knowledge_knowledge_collection.KnowledgeCollection)[]

Collections of knowledge to search within

### `Optional`config

config?: [RetrievalConfigInterface](./common_types.RetrievalConfigInterface)

Optional retrieval configuration

### history

history: [History](/classes/core_history.History)

Conversation history for context-aware retrieval
